en.title:
Peer to peer video
streaming platform
en.description:
TiNG is a decentralized peer to peer borderless video streaming platform that allows viewers and content creators to reach audiences globally without the need for strong internet connectivity.The platform allows viewers to stream videos to one another, creating an open network with no limitations.
The more viewers using the platform, the faster the network and video streaming becomes without the need of large costly infrastructure and bottlenecks.
